TopicTitle: Action Group does not show activate engine for bottle-rocket escape system

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win 11 v10.0.22621 | CPU: i7 12700 2100Mhz | GPU: NVidia GeForce RTX 3060 Ti | RAM: 32GB

 

When using the LES bottle-rocket escape system and then linking the activation of the escape system to the action group abort, there is no "Activate Engine".   So the decoupler fires, the parachutes deploy, but the bottle-rocket doesn't fire.    

 

Edited August 8, 2023 by Anth12
